knimeNode.name: TimestampAligner
knimeNode.shortDescription: Takes two tables with timestamp columns and and assigns to each column from the first table the column from the second table with the closest previous timestamp.

fullDescription.intro: Takes two tables with timestamp columns and and assigns to each column from the first table the column from the second table with the closest previous timestamp.

ports.inPort: The table with timestamps to align.
The table with timestamps to align to.
ports.outPort: The First table with appended rows from the second table.
